Setting.Label: Splitting Options
Setting.ToolTip: Gives options of where to split

Setting.Label: Any%
Setting.ToolTip: Splits for all main missions not modern day

Setting.Label: Modern Day
Setting.ToolTip: Splits when entering the animus for the modern day missions

Setting.Label: Everything
Setting.ToolTip: Splits on everything. Missions, collectibles, etc. This is only recommended for 100% runs & if you have a split for everything

Setting.Label: Contracts
Setting.ToolTip: Splits when gaining money from completing a contract

Setting.Label: Templar Hunts
Setting.ToolTip: Splits when completing a templar hunt mission

Setting.Label: Forts
Setting.ToolTip: Splits when a fort turns green on the map

Setting.Label: Taverns
Setting.ToolTip: Splits on defeating all guards for a tavern

Setting.Label: Shipwrecks
Setting.ToolTip: Splits when getting a set number of chests from shipwrecks
